3.2 RC1a

I just happened to me that the Navigator does not show new resources after copying them from one folder (via ctrl+c) to another folder (ctrl+v).

This only happens occessionally. I also noticed that in the Package Explorer.

I found the following info on the console but not in the log file. Why is it not logged?

PW
Yes, I think they are duplicates. Looks like the same causing exception and it would also explain why I saw it in the Package Explorer, too.

I'm going to resolve this as a duplicate, but if it turns out they're not related please re-open this bug (or gen a new one).

PW
